title: Can we make dua using mixture of English & Arabic words in Sujood & last tashahhud? Assim al hakeem
transcript: and from india says what to do when the dua in sujud when we know some words of dua in arabic and some we don't know for example allah this is franco arab this is yeah okay if if you don't know how to say the full thing in arabic say it in english don't play with words like this because this would not be appropriate so ask allah azza give me high grades in the examination or learn how to say the whole thing in arabic you
